燈下黑.definition: (lit.) it's dark right under the lamp; (fig.) people tend to overlook things right under their noses

燈塔市.definition: Dengta, county-level city in Liaoyang 遼陽|辽阳[Liao2 yang2], Liaoning

燈會.definition: carnival during the Lantern Festival, with lantern displays and traditional folk performances such as stilt walking and lion dance

燈泡.definition: light bulb; see also 電燈泡|电灯泡[dian4 deng1 pao4]; third-wheel or unwanted third party spoiling a couple's date (slang); CL:個|个[ge4]

燈珠.definition: LED lamp bead; small light bulb

燈節.definition: the Lantern Festival (15th of first month of lunar calendar)

燈籠果.definition: cape gooseberry; Peruvian ground-cherry; Physalis peruviana

燈紅酒綠.definition: lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking; debauched and corrupt environment

燈罩.definition: cover of lamp; lampshade; glass cover of oil lamp

燈芯草.definition: see 燈心草|灯心草[deng1 xin1 cao3]

燈草.definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps

燈草絨.definition: see 燈芯絨|灯芯绒[deng1 xin1 rong2]

燈謎.definition: riddles written on lanterns (e.g. for the Lantern Festival at the end of Chinese New Year)

燈頭.definition: electric light socket; burner (component of a kerosene lamp); light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
